task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 8 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Implement CRUD operations for teams including creation, updates, and member management
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. POST /api/teams - Create team with owner assignment 2. GET /api/teams/:id - Fetch team details with member count and role checking 3. PATCH /api/teams/:id - Update team name/description (admin+ only) 4. DELETE /api/teams/:id - Soft delete team (owner only) 5. GET /api/teams/:id/members - List team members with roles 6. DELETE /api/teams/:id/members/:user_id - Remove member (admin+ only)

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-8): Build team management API endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test all CRUD operations, verify role-based access, validate member count calculations and soft deletion
